default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
small handful fresh basil, chopped, to serve

steps: Season the tomatoes with salt and freshly ground black pepper and spread over the pitta breads. Sprinkle over the cheese and sliced sausage.
Drizzle each mini pizza with a little olive oil and place onto a non-stick baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake for 6-8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and golden-brown.
To serve, place the mini pizzas onto plates and sprinkle over the basil.
title: Mini pitta pizzas
